Title: The Climactic Battle! The Miraculous Power of a Relentless Warrior!
Actors: Doc Morgan, Christopher Sabat, Sean Schemmel, Eric Vale
Plot: After Goku's attack shakes Zamazu's balance and reveal a weakness in him, he and Vegeta fuse together as they see hope to prevail. Nevertheless, It's Trunks's world and to him it all ultimately comes down.. .
